ingredients.ingredient: 1 pinch Salt and pepper as needed
1 pinch Salt and pepper as needed
1 ½ pounds white fish such as cod, tilalpia or haddock, cut into serving portions
1 ½ cups VH® Pad Thai Sauce

cookingTips: Arrange vegetables and fish on the same sheet pan for easy cleanup and even cooking
Cook asparagus and tomatoes first, then add fish to prevent overcooking
Brush glaze on fish during the last few minutes of cooking for a glossy finish without burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This sheet pan dinner combines delicate fish with roasted vegetables. How comfortable are you gauging when white fish is cooked through?
